description: Synthetic fibers and a molded foam insole were the basis for what was once a robust and comfortable combat boot. Now, it's a home for tiny aquatic organisms.

drops.location: Hallowed Flame Endurance Caches, Rotation A
Hallowed Flame Mission Caches, Rotation A

name: Boot

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: The Profit-Taker - Update 24.2
patchlogs.additions: The Business now offers a Corpus Boot Trophy to really pump up your Orbiter aesthetic.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed seeing an option to place a Boot in the Personal Quarter aquarium. Boots belong on feet.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23
patchlogs.additions: Ask and ye shall receive! That closet full of Cetus Boots can now be crafted into a Boot Trophy from Fisher Hai Luk’s Offerings. We hope they haven’t been festering any fungal growth in the meantime....

description: Developed to perform remote construction and maintenance routines. It can be found in ponds around Venus.
name: Brickie

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Narrow-Spectrum Bait was incorrectly described as attracting Tinks and Brickies (they are common fish and only require Broad-Spectrum Bait; Narrow-Spectrum Bait attracts Recasters and Eye-Eyes).

description: A surveillance drone that monitors any activity that disturbs the waters. It can be found in ponds around Venus.
name: Eye-Eye

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.6
patchlogs.changes: Broad Spectrum Bait description updated to reflect its use to attract Sapcaddies, Tinks, Eye-Eyes and Brickies.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.5
patchlogs.changes:
The Eye-Eye now shows up during warm temperature only instead of cool temperature in Orb Vallis.
Narrow-Spectrum Bait was incorrectly described as attracting Tinks and Brickies (they are common fish and only require Broad-Spectrum Bait; Narrow-Spectrum Bait attracts Recasters and Eye-Eyes).

description: These specimens were originally parasites, breeding inside the wyrm-guts of Fass and scattered across Deimos in the debris of his explosive demise. They are drawn to his light.
name: Flagellocanth

patchlogs.name: Orphix Venom: Hotfix 29.6.5
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted Flagellocanth hit box to allow for easier targeting.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Flagellocanth caught scenes having incorrect positioning.

patchlogs.name: Orphix Venom: Hotfix 29.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where the Dioramas when catching Lobotriscid or Flagellocanth are swapped.

patchlogs.name: Deimos: Arcana: Hotfix 29.5.5 + 29.5.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Luminous Dye not highlighting the Flagellocanth.

patchlogs.name: Update 29.5: Deimos Arcana
patchlogs.changes: The Endocrine are home to 2 new species of Fish! Find the elusive Flagellocanth and Lobotriscid to bring back to Daughter!

description: The Glappid is a scavenger that feasts on the remains of dead fish. It has formed a symbiotic bond with the Seram Beetle which extracts and feeds upon any toxins ingested by the Glappid.
name: Glappid

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon Remaster: Hotfix 24.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Changed Rahn Prism Blueprint to require 3 Seram Beetle Shells instead of Glappid Bait.

description: Displays blood-spattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.

description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

drops.location: Hallowed Flame Endurance Caches, Rotation A
Hallowed Flame Mission Caches, Rotation A

name: Norg

patchlogs.name: TennoGen & Nightwave Episode 5: Hotfix 25.7.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Norg’s Mask and Mother’s Mask having a temporary price of 1 Credit.

patchlogs.name: TennoGen & Nightwave Episode 5: Hotfix 25.7.7
patchlogs.changes: The Norg Mask, Mother’s Mask, and Grineer Mask now have a higher chance of appearing in Nakak’s store. This also fixes an issue where they would never appear

patchlogs.name: Arbitrations Revisited: Hotfix 25.7.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Norg Mask not appearing in Nakak’s Masks and Oddities rotation.

patchlogs.name: Prime Vault: Hotfix 25.7.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a number of different Operator accessories excessively clipping with the Norg Mask and Mother's Mask when ‘Hood Opened” is selected.

patchlogs.name: Saint of Altra: Update 25.7.0
patchlogs.additions: The winning Venetian Carnival Contest designs are now part of Nakak’s shop rotation! Keep an eye out at Nakak’s shop to obtain the majestic Norg Mask designed by Roimonstre and the beautiful Mother’s Mask designed by HUMERONYMUS.

description: Facilitates long-distance communication between robotics deployed in the aqua systems. It can be found in the ponds around Venus.
name: Recaster

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.5
patchlogs.changes:
Recaster Bait is now correctly labeled as Longwinder Bait.
Narrow-Spectrum Bait was incorrectly described as attracting Tinks and Brickies (they are common fish and only require Broad-Spectrum Bait; Narrow-Spectrum Bait attracts Recasters and Eye-Eyes).

patchlogs.changes: Recaster

description: Repairs robotics that have broken down in the aqua systems. It can be found in ponds around Venus.
name: Tink

patchlogs.name: Deimos: Arcana: Hotfix 29.5.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Bonewidow’s Weapon Pod Blueprint requiring 45 Tinks. It will now require 45 Scrap as originally intended (obtained from dismantling Servofish at The Business in Fortuna). 
We’ll be reviewing the backend to see if any players spent the 45 Tink and rushed the Blueprint crafting.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.6
patchlogs.changes: Broad Spectrum Bait description updated to reflect its use to attract Sapcaddies, Tinks, Eye-Eyes and Brickies.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Narrow-Spectrum Bait was incorrectly described as attracting Tinks and Brickies (they are common fish and only require Broad-Spectrum Bait; Narrow-Spectrum Bait attracts Recasters and Eye-Eyes).

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
patchlogs.changes: Tink
